org.js4ms.common.util.logging

Interface Loggable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationMessage, IPMessage, KeyedApplicationMessage<KeyType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractService, AmtMembershipQueryMessage, AmtMembershipUpdateMessage, AmtMessage, AmtMulticastDataMessage, AmtRelayAdvertisementMessage, AmtRelayDiscoveryMessage, AmtRequestMessage, AmtTeardownMessage, BufferBackedObject, GenericObjectPool, ICMPv6Message, IGMPGroupMessage, IGMPGroupRecord, IGMPMessage, IGMPQueryMessage, IGMPv2LeaveMessage, IGMPv2QueryMessage, IGMPv2ReportMessage, IGMPv3QueryMessage, IGMPv3ReportMessage, IPAuthenticationHeader, IPDatagram, IPEncapsulatingSecurityPayload, IPEndOfListOption, IPExtensionHeader, IPHeaderOption, IPinIPHeader, IPMultiByteHeaderOption, IPNoOperationOption, IPPacket, IPPayload, IPSingleByteHeaderOption, IPv4Packet, IPv4RouterAlertOption, IPv6DestinationOptionsHeader, IPv6FragmentHeader, IPv6HopByHopOptionsHeader, IPv6OptionsHeader, IPv6Packet, IPv6RouterAlertOption, IPv6RoutingHeader, IPv6RoutingType0Header, LoggableBase, MLDGroupMessage, MLDGroupRecord, MLDMessage, MLDQueryMessage, MLDv1DoneMessage, MLDv1QueryMessage, MLDv1ReportMessage, MLDv2QueryMessage, MLDv2ReportMessage, RtspService, UdpDatagram, UdpPacket

    public interface Loggable
    Interface exposed by objects whose internal state can be logged.
    Author:
    Gregory Bumgardner

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Logger getLogger()
      Returns the Logger instance used by this object to generate log messages.
      void log(Logger logger, Level level)
      Logs internal state of object using specified logger for output.
